meanings: A lost fish is[looks] bigger, A fish that got away is[looks] bigger

vlive.korean: 그럼 이런 기회를 놓치면 큰일 나겠죠? You won't give up this opportunity. 듣기 View video 핵인싸 동맹 (HACKINSSA CREW) : [핵인싸동맹] EP.18 방송최초! 게임하다 토하는 연예인 ㄹㅇ약 빨고 하는 방송
vlive.english: You won't give up this opportunity.

vlive.korean: [뮤직비디오에서 원스가 놓치면 안 되는 포인트가 있다면?] [What is the point of TWICE's M/V?] View video TWICE : TWICE TV "FANCY" EP.08
vlive.english: [What is the point of TWICE's M/V?]

vlive.korean: 하루도 1분 1초도 놓치면 안되는 거 알죠? You know that you can't miss even for a second right? 듣기 View video OSEN : "우주 like?" SF9, '스타로드'에 떴다 #Teaser
vlive.english: You know that you can't miss even for a second right?

vlive.korean: 놓치면 거기에 서있어야 되거든요. If I missed it then I had to stand there so... 듣기 View video NCT : Stop,💚Stop. Baby Don't Stop💚
vlive.english: If I missed it then I had to stand there so...

vlive.korean: 정말 오늘 '엠카'를 놓치면 후회할 거 같은 그런 날입니다 여러분. It's a day that you'll regret if you miss today's "M COUNTDOWN." 듣기 View video Mnet : Mnet's Broadcast
vlive.english: It's a day that you'll regret if you miss today's "M COUNTDOWN."

examples.korean: If you miss that train then you’ll have to get a taxi. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 기차를 놓치면 그러면 택시를 타야 할 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: If you miss that train then you’ll have to get a taxi. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Hurry up! It would be a shame to miss the beginning of the play. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 서둘러요! 연극의 첫 부분을 놓치면 애석할 거예요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Hurry up! It would be a shame to miss the beginning of the play. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: There is a tide in the affairs of men which taken at the flood, leads on to fortune; Omitted, all the voyage of their life Is bound in shallows and in miseries. (William Shakespeare) 듣기 Add to Wordbook 인간사엔 기회라는 것이 있는 법, 기회를 잘 타면 성공에 도달하지만, 놓치면 인생 항로는 여울에 박혀 불행하기 마련이오. (윌리엄 셰익스피어 , 성공명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: There is a tide in the affairs of men which taken at the flood, leads on to fortune; Omitted, all the voyage of their life Is bound in shallows and in miseries. (William Shakespeare) Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: If we miss the bus, we must foot it. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리가 버스를 놓치면 걸어갈 수밖에 없다. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: If we miss the bus, we must foot it. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: You shouldn't miss this opportunity. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이 기회를 놓치면 안 된다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
